statement: Cairo is the capital city of Egypt.
The Nile River is the longest river in the world.
The Great Pyramid of Giza is the largest pyramid in Egypt.
Arabic is the official language of Egypt.
The Sphinx has the body of a lion and the head of a human.
Cleopatra was the last pharaoh of ancient Egypt.
The Valley of the Kings is located near Luxor.
Egypt is located entirely in Africa.
The ancient Library of Alexandria was destroyed by fire.
The Red Sea borders Egypt to the north.
Tutankhamun's tomb was discovered completely intact.
The Rosetta Stone helped decipher hieroglyphics.
All Egyptian pyramids are located in Giza.
The Aswan High Dam was built to control the Nile River.
